title: Ethnographic Learning Design Linked to Vocational Settings: Strengthening Practitioner Competencies for Improved Employability

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based learning analyzing and resolving real-world literacy challenges (documents/reports/collaborative communication) faced by professionals through ethnographic approaches

learning_goals: Learners can observe and document workplace-specific literacies (e.g., document writing, report analysis) to derive at least three contextual characteristics
Based on data collected through field investigations, learners can propose two or more actionable improvement plans to enhance workplace literacy
Learners can systematically document (portfolio) and present workplace literacy implementation strategies incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
